abstract_summ: Since the end of 2019, Corona Virus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) has been the cause of a worldwide pandemic . Study investigated and compared the mental status and inflammatory markers of 103 patients who, while hospitalized with mild symptoms, tested positive with the virus, and 103 matched controls that were negative . The severity of depression, anxiety, and post-traumatic stress symptoms (PTSS) was measured via an on-line survey and a semi-structured interview .
